1: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>[was] twenty</n> וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>and five</n> שָׁנָה֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> מָלַ֣ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>[when] he began to reign</n> אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>Amaziah</n> וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>twenty</n> וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <sup>8672 </sup> <n>and nine</n> שָׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> מָלַ֖ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>and he reigned</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> וְשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> אִמּ֔וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>And his mother's</n> יְהוֹעַדָּ֖ן <sup>3086 </sup> <n>[was] Jehoaddan</n> מִירוּשָׁלָֽיִם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n>
2: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And he did</n> הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>[that which was] right</n> בְּעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> רַ֕ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בְּלֵבָ֥ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>heart</n> שָׁלֵֽם׃ <sup>8003 </sup> <n>but not with a perfect</n>
3: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> חָזְקָ֥ה <sup>2388 </sup> <n>was established</n> הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <sup>4467 </sup> <n>Now it came to pass when the kingdom</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וַֽיַּהֲרֹג֙ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>to him that he slew</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲבָדָ֔יו <sup>5650 </sup> <n>his servants</n> הַמַּכִּ֖ים <sup>5221 </sup> <n>that had killed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> אָבִֽיו׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n>
4: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>not their children</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> הֵמִ֑ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>But he slew</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כַכָּת֣וּב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>but [did] as [it is] written</n> בַּתּוֹרָ֡ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>in the law</n> בְּסֵ֣פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in the book</n> מֹשֶׁה֩ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>of Moses</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוָּ֨ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>where the LORD</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָמ֨וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall not die</n> אָב֤וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>The fathers</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> בָּנִים֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the children</n> וּבָנִים֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>neither shall the children</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָמ֣וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> אָב֔וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>for the fathers</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>but</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>but every man</n> בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <sup>2399 </sup> <n>for his own sin</n> יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall die</n> פ
5: וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>together</n> אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>Moreover Amaziah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֣ם <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and made</n> לְבֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>according to the houses</n> אָב֗וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>of [their] fathers</n> לְשָׂרֵ֤י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>them captains</n> הָאֲלָפִים֙ <sup>505 </sup> <n>over thousands</n> וּלְשָׂרֵ֣י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and captains</n> הַמֵּא֔וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>over hundreds</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>throughout all Judah</n> וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>and Benjamin</n> וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֗ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and he numbered</n> לְמִבֶּ֨ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>them from twenty</n> שָׁנָה֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> וָמַ֔עְלָה <sup>4605 </sup> <n>and above</n> וַיִּמְצָאֵ֗ם <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and found</n> שְׁלֹשׁ־ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>them three</n> מֵא֨וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אֶ֤לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> בָּחוּר֙ <sup>970 </sup> <n>choice</n> יוֹצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>[men able] to go forth</n> צָבָ֔א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>to war</n> אֹחֵ֖ז <sup>270 </sup> <n>that could handle</n> רֹ֥מַח <sup>7420 </sup> <n>spear</n> וְצִנָּֽה׃ <sup>6793 </sup> <n>and shield</n>
6: וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֣ר <sup>7936 </sup> <n>He hired</n> מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>out of Israel</n> מֵ֥אָה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>also an hundred</n> אֶ֛לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> גִּבּ֥וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>mighty</n> חָ֖יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>men of valour</n> בְּמֵאָ֥ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>for an hundred</n> כִכַּר־ <sup>3603 </sup> <n>talents</n> כָּֽסֶף׃ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n>
7: וְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> בָּ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>But there came</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>to him saying</n> הַמֶּ֕לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>O king</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>go</n> עִמְּךָ֖ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>let</n> צְבָ֣א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>let not the army</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֤ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>[is] not with Israel</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[to wit with] all the children</n> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n>
8: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>But</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בֹּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>But if thou wilt go</n> אַתָּ֔ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֲשֵׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n> חֲזַ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>[it] be strong</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>for the battle</n> יַכְשִֽׁילְךָ֤ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>shall make thee fall</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אוֹיֵ֔ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>the enemy</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>hath</n> כֹּ֛חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>power</n> בֵּאלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>for God</n> לַעְז֥וֹר <sup>5826 </sup> <n>to help</n> וּלְהַכְשִֽׁיל׃ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>and to cast down</n>
9: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>And Amaziah</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וּמַֽה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> לַּעֲשׂוֹת֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>But what shall we do</n> לִמְאַ֣ת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>for the hundred</n> הַכִּכָּ֔ר <sup>3603 </sup> <n>talents</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֖תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which I have given</n> לִגְד֣וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>to the army</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>answered</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the man</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> יֵ֚שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>is</n> לַֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> לָ֥תֶת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>able to give</n> לְךָ֖ הַרְבֵּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>thee much more</n> מִזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
10: וַיַּבְדִּילֵ֣ם <sup>914 </sup> <n>separated</n> אֲמַצְיָ֗הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>Then Amaziah</n> לְהַגְּדוּד֙ <sup>1416 </sup> <n>them [to wit] the army</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בָּ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>that was come</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>to him out of Ephraim</n> לָלֶ֖כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> לִמְקוֹמָ֑ם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>home</n> וַיִּ֨חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>kindled</n> אַפָּ֤ם <sup>639 </sup> <n>wherefore their anger</n> מְאֹד֙ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>was greatly</n> בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>against Judah</n> וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and they returned</n> לִמְקוֹמָ֖ם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>home</n> בָּחֳרִי־ <sup>2750 </sup> <n>in great</n> אָֽף׃ <sup>639 </sup> <n>anger</n> פ
11: וַאֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>And Amaziah</n> הִתְחַזַּ֔ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>strengthened</n> וַיִּנְהַג֙ <sup>5090 </sup> <n>himself and led forth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> גֵּ֣יא <sup>1516 </sup> <n>to the valley</n> הַמֶּ֑לַח <sup>4417 </sup> <n>of salt</n> וַיַּ֥ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and smote</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> שֵׂעִ֖יר <sup>8165 </sup> <n>of Seir</n> עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <sup>6235 </sup> <n>ten</n> אֲלָפִֽים׃ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n>
12: וַעֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <sup>6235 </sup> <n>And [other] ten</n> אֲלָפִ֜ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> חַיִּ֗ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>[left] alive</n> שָׁבוּ֙ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>carry away captive</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>did the children</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וַיְבִיא֖וּם <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought</n> לְרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>them unto the top</n> הַסָּ֑לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>of the rock</n> וַיַּשְׁלִיכ֛וּם <sup>7993 </sup> <n>and cast them down</n> מֵֽרֹאשׁ־ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>from the top</n> הַסֶּ֖לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>of the rock</n> וְכֻלָּ֥ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>were all</n> נִבְקָֽעוּ׃ <sup>1234 </sup> <n>that they all were broken in pieces</n> ס
13: וּבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>But the soldiers</n> הַגְּד֗וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>of the army</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>sent</n> הֵשִׁ֤יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>sent back</n> אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>which Amaziah</n> מִלֶּ֤כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> עִמּוֹ֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>with him to battle</n> וַֽיִּפְשְׁטוּ֙ <sup>6584 </sup> <n>fell</n> בְּעָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>upon the cities</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> מִשֹּׁמְר֖וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>from Samaria</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בֵּ֣ית חוֹר֑וֹן <sup>1032 </sup> <n>even unto Bethhoron</n> וַיַּכּ֤וּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and smote</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> אֲלָפִ֔ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וַיָּבֹ֖זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>of them and took</n> בִּזָּ֥ה <sup>961 </sup> <n>spoil</n> רַבָּֽה׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>much</n> ס
14: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחֲרֵ֨י <sup>310 </sup> <n>Now it came to pass after</n> ב֤וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>was come</n> אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>that Amaziah</n> מֵֽהַכּ֣וֹת <sup>5221 </sup> <n>from the slaughter</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲדוֹמִ֔ים <sup>130 </sup> <n>of the Edomites</n> וַיָּבֵ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>that he brought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהֵי֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>the gods</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> שֵׂעִ֔יר <sup>8165 </sup> <n>of Seir</n> וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֥ם <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and set them up</n> ל֖וֹ לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>[to be] his gods</n> וְלִפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>himself before</n> יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and bowed down</n> וְלָהֶ֥ם יְקַטֵּֽר׃ <sup>6999 </sup> <n>them and burned incense</n>
15: וַיִּֽחַר־ <sup>2734 </sup> <n>was kindled</n> אַ֥ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>Wherefore the anger</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בַּאֲמַצְיָ֑הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>against Amaziah</n> וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and he sent</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> נָבִ֔יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>unto him a prophet</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>which said</n> ל֗וֹ לָ֤מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> דָרַ֙שְׁתָּ֙ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>unto him Why hast thou sought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>after the gods</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> הִצִּ֥ילוּ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>which could not deliver</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמָּ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>their own people</n> מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>able</n>
16: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְּדַבְּר֣וֹ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And it came to pass as he talked</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>him</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>with him that [the king] said</n> לוֹ֙ הַלְיוֹעֵ֤ץ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>counsel</n> לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king's</n> נְתַנּ֔וּךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>unto him Art thou made</n> חֲדַל־ <sup>2308 </sup> <n>? forbear</n> לְךָ֖ לָ֣מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> יַכּ֑וּךָ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>why shouldest thou be smitten</n> וַיֶּחְדַּ֣ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>forbare</n> הַנָּבִ֗יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>? Then the prophet</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> יָדַ֗עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> יָעַ֤ץ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>hath determined</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>that God</n> לְהַשְׁחִיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>to destroy</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> עָשִׂ֣יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thee because thou hast done</n> זֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>this and hast not hearkened</n> לַעֲצָתִֽי׃ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>unto my counsel</n> פ
17: וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>took advice</n> אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>Then Amaziah</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יוֹאָ֨שׁ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>to Joash</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְהוֹאָחָ֧ז <sup>3059 </sup> <n>of Jehoahaz</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יֵה֛וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>of Jehu</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> [לְךָ כ] (לְכָ֖ה ק) נִתְרָאֶ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>let us see one another</n> פָנִֽים׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>in the face</n>
18: וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> יוֹאָ֣שׁ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>And Joash</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>to Amaziah</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָה֮ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> לֵאמֹר֒ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> הַח֜וֹחַ <sup>2336 </sup> <n>The thistle</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>that [was] in Lebanon</n> שָׁ֠לַח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָאֶ֜רֶז <sup>730 </sup> <n>to the cedar</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּלְּבָנוֹן֙ <sup>3844 </sup> <n>that [was] in Lebanon</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> תְּנָֽה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּתְּךָ֥ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>thy daughter</n> לִבְנִ֖י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to my son</n> לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>to wife</n> וַֽתַּעֲבֹ֞ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and there passed by</n> חַיַּ֤ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>beast</n> הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>a wild</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>that [was] in Lebanon</n> וַתִּרְמֹ֖ס <sup>7429 </sup> <n>and trode down</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֽוֹחַ׃ <sup>2336 </sup> <n>the thistle</n>
19: אָמַ֗רְתָּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thou sayest</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> הִכִּ֙יתָ֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Lo thou hast smitten</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱד֔וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>the Edomites</n> וּנְשָׂאֲךָ֥ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>lifteth thee up</n> לִבְּךָ֖ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and thine heart</n> לְהַכְבִּ֑יד <sup>3513 </sup> <n>to boast</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> שְׁבָ֣ה <sup>3427 </sup> <n>abide</n> בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>now at home</n> לָ֤מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>why</n> תִתְגָּרֶה֙ <sup>1624 </sup> <n>why shouldest thou meddle</n> בְּרָעָ֔ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>to [thine] hurt</n> וְנָ֣פַלְתָּ֔ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>that thou shouldest fall</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וִיהוּדָ֥ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>[even] thou and Judah</n> עִמָּֽךְ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
20: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>would not hear</n> אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>But Amaziah</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> מֵהָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>for it [came] of God</n> הִ֔יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לְמַ֖עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>might</n> תִּתָּ֣ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that he might deliver</n> בְּיָ֑ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them into the hand</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> דָֽרְשׁ֔וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>[of their enemies] because they sought</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>after the gods</n> אֱדֽוֹם׃ <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n>
21: וַיַּ֨עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went up</n> יוֹאָ֤שׁ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>So Joash</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיִּתְרָא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and they saw one another</n> פָנִ֔ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>in the face</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> וַאֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>[both] he and Amaziah</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> בְּבֵ֥ית שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <sup>1053 </sup> <n>at Bethshemesh</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לִיהוּדָֽה׃ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>which [belongeth] to Judah</n>
22: וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <sup>5062 </sup> <n>was put to the worse</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>And Judah</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and they fled</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>to his tent</n>

26: וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <sup>3499 </sup> <n>Now the rest</n> דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>of the acts</n> אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <sup>558 </sup> <n>of Amaziah</n> הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <sup>7223 </sup> <n>first</n> וְהָאַחֲרוֹנִ֑ים <sup>314 </sup> <n>and last</n> הֲלֹא֙ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הִנָּ֣ם <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> כְּתוּבִ֔ים <sup>3789 </sup> <n>behold [are] they not written</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> סֵ֥פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in the book</n> מַלְכֵי־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the kings</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n>
27: וּמֵעֵ֗ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>Now after the time</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> סָ֤ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>did turn away</n> אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>558 </sup> <n>that Amaziah</n> מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>from following</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַיִּקְשְׁר֨וּ <sup>7194 </sup> <n>they made</n> עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> קֶ֛שֶׁר <sup>7195 </sup> <n>a conspiracy</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>against him in Jerusalem</n> וַיָּ֣נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and he fled</n> לָכִ֑ישָׁה <sup>3923 </sup> <n>to Lachish</n> וַיִּשְׁלְח֤וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>but they sent</n> אַחֲרָיו֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> לָכִ֔ישָׁה <sup>3923 </sup> <n>to Lachish</n> וַיְמִיתֻ֖הוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>him and slew</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
